body_html:
PY2_AND_3 just tells bazel not to try and auto-convert the code to another python version in case of a mismatch (which never works anyway). @gunan we should definitely improve the output of this to make clear what is happening for Py3.

@al3xsh can you reconfigure for Py2 and run the update? Sorry for the complication.
body_text:
PY2_AND_3 just tells bazel not to try and auto-convert the code to another python version in case of a mismatch (which never works anyway). @gunan we should definitely improve the output of this to make clear what is happening for Py3.
@al3xsh can you reconfigure for Py2 and run the update? Sorry for the complication.
body:
PY2_AND_3 just tells bazel not to try and auto-convert the code to another python version in case of a mismatch (which never works anyway). @gunan we should definitely improve the output of this to make clear what is happening for Py3.

@al3xsh can you reconfigure for Py2 and run the update? Sorry for the complication.
